title: Trump Made Rs 2 Crore From Bible Sales, Holds Rs 8 Crore In Crypto: Report
content: Donald Trump's recent financial disclosures reveal over $1 million in cryptocurrency holdings and $300,000 earned from endorsing "The Greenwood Bible."
summary: Donald Trump's recent financial disclosures reveal over $1 million in cryptocurrency holdings and $300,000 earned from endorsing "The Greenwood Bible."

title: Google Brings 'AI Overviews' To India With Country-First Features
content: Tech giant Google has announced to bring its 'AI Overviews' feature to six new countries, including India.

title: Joe Biden Goes From Star To Sideshow At Democratic Convention
content: A few short weeks ago, Joe Biden was set to headline the Democratic National Convention -- but after a brutal political comedown, he's now the warm-up act for Kamala Harris.

title: Russian Spies Were Stealing US Tech During Cold War. Then FBI Did This

title: What Parents Of Boys Must Know About Online 'Misogynist Radicalisation'

title: "Critical Shortage" Of Cholera Vaccine, Says WHO, Calls for Production Boost
content: The head of the World Health Organization on Thursday called for increased production of cholera vaccines, highlighting what he called a "critical shortage" around the globe.

title: China's Driverless 'Robotaxis': Sci-fi Marvels Or Safety Concerns?
content: Turning heads as they cruise past office buildings and malls, driverless taxis are slowly spreading through Chinese cities, prompting both wariness and wonder.

title: Geneva Conventions Turn 75. Do Laws Of War Have A Chance In Today's Era?
content: This week marked 75 years since the adoption of the Geneva Conventions on August 12 1949. In theory, these rules of war are universally agreed by every nation. In practice, they are routinely violated everywhere.
summary: This week marked 75 years since the adoption of the Geneva Conventions on August 12 1949. In theory, these rules of war are universally agreed by every nation. In practice, they are routinely violated everywhere.

title: Australia Rejects 7000 Palestinian Visas, Approves More For Israelis: Report
content: Out of over 10,000 Palestinian applications, only 2922 were approved, while nearly 8750 Israeli visas were granted following the October 7 attacks.

title: Will AI Bubble Burst? All The Buzz Around The Hottest Tech Trend

title: Mpox Outbreak Could Soon Turn Into The Next Global Pandemic. Know More
content: The mpox outbreak in Africa is yet another example of how infectious diseases perceived to be "someone elses problem", and affecting mainly poor, developing countries, may suddenly pose unexpected global threats.

title: Pakistan Reports 1st M-Pox Case As Saudi Arabia Returnee Tests Positive
content: Pakistan has confirmed its first monkeypox case of the year after a man who recently returned from Saudi Arabia tested positive for the virus, ARY News reported citing the Ministry of Health.

title: How Extreme Weather Is Leading To Rise In Child Marriages In Pakistan
content: As monsoon rains were about to break over Pakistan, 14-year-old Shamila and her 13-year-old sister Amina were married off in exchange for money, a decision their parents made to help the family survive the threat of floods.

title: US Lawmakers Call On Mark Zuckerberg, Press Meta Over Illicit Drug Ads

title: Joe Biden, Kamala Harris United At 1st Joint Event Since Presidential Bid
